name: Bootstraps
description: Randomly place any card from any suit into your next queue slot. (And gain $1,000)

immediateEffect.script: Player.Money += 1000; var randomCard = GetRandomCardFromAllSuits(); if (randomCard != null) { PlayerQueue.Add(randomCard); Log(PlayerDisplayName + " pulls themselves up by their bootstraps! Gained " + randomCard.Name + " and $1,000!"); } else { Log(PlayerDisplayName + " gains $1,000!"); }
